# Recharge Innate Magic (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 3]], [[3rd Level Bard Spells|Bard 3]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 3]], [[3rd Level Magus Spells|Magus 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Witch Spells|Witch 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric, 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mageâ€™s Tower website

You channel magic energy into your own aura, recharging your innate magic abilities. You regain one use of all 0-level through 3rd-level spell-like abilities you can use as a result of a racial trait.
